podcast_details.description: Hosts Chris Larios & Nikolas Freeman run down the new weekly manga chapters with an eye to critique while still going off on joking tangents.

podcast_details.podcast_name: Pixar Post Podcast: Animation News, Interviews & Reviews
podcast_details.description: The Pixar Post Podcast is a natural extension of our website (www.pixarpost.com) and is run by the husband and wife team of T.J. and Julie. We will discuss all thing Pixar - from news, rumors, merchandise, reviews, interviews, Pixar history and much more. This family-friendly show is presented in an entertaining, positive and upbeat light. Please note - this Podcast is not affiliated with Pixar Animation Studios.
Joseph and Chris plop down on the floor with a big bowl of sugary cereal to watch all your favorite cartoons, both old and new!
Reviewing all types of manga, anime old and new with a critical and passionate eye. Email: seshos@hotmail.com
Love anime? So do we. Transformation Sequence takes a series or film every week and breaks it wide open.
The show that truly talks All Things Transformers. Steve and the guys break down news, characters, the series, releases and information.

Join us as we lick our blades, banter and ramble on, and provide in depth reviews of some of our favorite (and not so favorite) Anime, Kaiju, Martial Arts, Chambara, and Asian films.  You can find out more about our show, all of our previous episodes, and our show notes at our blog: bladelickingthieves.wordpress.com
Podcast discussing all things Dragon Ball Super, My Hero Academia, Godzilla and all other geeky things.
Listen as Shaun explores the sometimes weird, sometimes wonderful, and always hilarious world of Anime. And Remington tries to understand any of it.

podcast_details.podcast_name: Gotta Watch'em All - A Pokémon Podcast
podcast_details.description: Gotta Watch'em All is a weekly podcast covering the world of Pokémon! Hosts Ken and Adam discuss the TCG, VGC, PoGO, Merchandise and Pokémon culture! Each show wraps a watch-along with the Anime!

podcast_details.podcast_name: Mobile Suit Breakdown: the Gundam Anime Podcast
podcast_details.description: MSB is a weekly Gundam podcast for new fans, old fans, and not yet fans. Nina (a Gundam first-timer) and Thom (a lifelong Gundam fan) analyze, review, and research all 40-years of the iconic sci-fi anime mega-franchise Mobile Suit Gundam in the order it was made. We research its influences, examine its themes, and discuss how each piece of the Gundam canon fits within the changing context in Japan and the world, from 1979 to today. Part history podcast, part discussion podcast, all Gundam podcast.

A+ Anime is OKBeast.com's bi-weekly anime podcast dedicated to studying anime. Hosts Ian Preschel and Nato Johnston sit down to analyze and discuss a plethora of anime titles from across the spectrum. How high of a grade will your favorite anime receive? Tune in to find out!
A fan made podcast dedicated to the anime Demon Slayer. Created by ToonamiFaithful.com.

A manga discussion podcast focusing on shojo (and josei!) series that make your heart go doki-doki. Covering classics like CLAMP’s “Cardcaptor Sakura” and Yuu Watase’s “Fushigi Yuugi” to newer favorites like Kazune Kawahara’s “My Love Story!!” and Hiro Fujiwara’s “Maid Sama!” 

Shojo & Tell host Ashley McDonnell discusses one series per episode with a rotating shojo superfan. (And sometimes, a shoujo superfan.)

Shojo [or shoujo] manga: Japanese comics made for young women. A breath of fresh air after reading 72 volumes of “Naruto.” The underappreciated sibling of all those same-y never-ending shonen titles.

Three friends discuss all things anime dropping weekly. The cast includes JoJo, LA Chaos and StevenUniverse from Gaming Illminaughty. 

Chaos Twitter: https://bit.ly/2SXbu6I
Twitch: https://bit.ly/2TtVfDj

Steven Twitter: https://bit.ly/2O0mpMs
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/stevenunivers3

JoJo Twitter: https://bit.ly/2TKfhc8 Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/otaku-summit/support

My Anime Podcast is a bi-weekly podcast which covers all things anime. As well as covering some of the latest weekly running anime there are also in depth multi episodic breakdowns of the best from the world of anime. Your hosts are Yata and Taka,
podcast_details.artist_name: Yata and Take. Anime fans and Otakus

podcast_details.description: One part the pinnacle of pseudo-nerd culture, and one part average joe. Topics ranging from Sports, TV, Music, Movies, Video Games, Comics, Manga, Anime, and current events. With your host, Potter. I hope ya'll enjoy, and thank you for tuning into the show. You can also find us on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Himalaya, and anywhere else podcasts can be found.

The official Moonkitty.net podcast, the Sailor Moon News Roundup podcast summarises all the latest Sailor Moon news and merchandise releases. After the latest information on the new Sailor Moon anime, Pretty Guardian Sailor Moon Crystal or interested in the latest Sailor Moon t-shirt design? This is the podcast for you! Sailor Moon Says!
Manga Mavericks is All-Comic.com's bi-weekly Manga centric podcasts from Colton and LumRanmaYahsa! Also includes Manga Mavericks @ Movies!
Just two anime-loving roommates chopping it up about their favorite genre and who once stole a couch to watch it.

#TheSwordcast is a pod where we geek out about Anime, Video Games, Comics, Pro Wrestling, Star Wars, Films, Martial Arts, TV Shows, Sports and anything else that fits under our umbrella... Explored from the lens of Detroit bred, Black & Brown artist, navigating a Hip-hop space. Episodes on Tuesdays...Stay Tuned
Nik & Ashley discuss gaming, anime, manga, and nerd culture. They bring their expertise and experience of fitness and strength and conditioning into the nerd kingdom!

Anime and comic books are two extraordinary and complex things.  Each week, join Jamal, an enthusiast of anime and comics, as he embarks or his overly-analytical journey through various story arcs, opening songs and game-changing moments with the aim of trying to make sense of it all.  If you like to take things that extra step further, this is the show for you!

Kicked out of anime club? No problem! Just listen to Running in the 90s, where three random goofuses talk about the anime that we grew up watching. Each week, we break down episodes, explore fandom content, and experience nostalgia for our favorite classic anime. Watch along with us as we work our way through Yu Yu Hakusho: Spirit Detective!

podcast_details.podcast_name: The Brother To Brother Podcast with JG & Shu
podcast_details.description: The Brother To Brother Podcast is a fly on the wall experience into the all encompassing conversations held by JG(@looklook_jg) & Shu (@sulanisynnesbitt). Check out new episodes of The Brother To Brother Podcast every monday wherever podcast can be found. To Infinity and Then Some. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/brothertobrotherpodcast/support

Anime and Games Discussions with The Con Artists (https://theconartistsblog.com).  We are a group of friends dedicated to bringing you the best and worst in Anime and Video Games. For the last several years, we have been presenting at RPI’s annual convention, Genericon.
Love Anime, Video games and Comics? We sure as hell do, so join us every week as we sit down and discuss all things nerdy. Topics Range from Dragon Ball Super to Spiderman. Don't forget to subscribe!
Ostensibly a podcast about anime. We take loose suggestions from listeners, workshop them into a 'perfect' new anime series, and pitch them to a less-than-enthusiastic consumer.
An anime and manga podcast by OG Bobby and Jace. Joined by Lambo. It's Anime and Manga talk but with a NYC twist!

podcast_details.podcast_name: Let's Stay Together: A Fruits Basket Podcast
podcast_details.description: A weekly podcast looking back at the manga series Fruits Basket by Natsuki Takaya.
Nick and James discuss video games, anime, and nerd culture.
A bi-weekly podcast where friends watch Internet Flash cartoons from the early 2000's and talk about them!
Adventure deep into Japanimation and curious cultural conundrums with Andrew, Jonstar, and the rest of the crew every other week with anime events coverage, news, and reviews.

Anime + Fanatic = ANIMATICS
Just 5 girls from London talking about anime

Brought to you by the OFFICIAL TRANSLATOR, welcome to the first ever podcast dedicated to the manga JUJUTSU KAISEN from SHONEN JUMP! So take your seat, flow with the music, and get ready for class as we discuss all things Jujutsu Kaisen (News, Chapter Reviews, Trivia, Theories, Giveaways and more). Casual discussion on Japanese culture and Japanese lessons as well!
On a mission to watch every single anime in the known universe with as many people as possible, and throw our opinions at them episode by episode. No cops....

podcast_details.podcast_name: It's Like a Podcast or Whatever
podcast_details.description: Your home for Nerd chat in the realms of comics, movies, pro-wrestling, cosplay and muzak-all through the filter of your lovely hosts, Everyday Rogue, Handsome Bane, Kayin P and Kit Kat Chinetti.

Home to the Anime Arcade and Bar Talk Podcasts!



Anime Arcade - The hosts of Anime Arcade sit down and talk all things anime and more!



Bar Talk - Logan sits down with local friends to drink beer and talk all things nerdy and fun!

podcast_details.podcast_name: Get in the Robot! A Podcast About Neon Genesis Evangelion
podcast_details.description: Trevor Ikrath loves Neon Genesis Evangelion and knows it practically by heart.  Dillon Flynn has heard of Neon Genesis Evangelion before and thinks it might be about big robots.  Can this evangelionist convert his friend to the cult?  Find out as they watch Hideaki Anno’s landmark 1995 mecha anime series week by week.

**New Episodes every Monday!** Join hosts dakazu, darfox8, Seamus2389, and Morgana Santilli for Manga Machinations! Our weekly manga discussions focus on introducing lots of unknown seinen(adult) manga and doing in-depth retrospective reviews of titles such as ‘A Silent Voice’, ‘Goodnight Punpun’, Tezuka Osamu’s ‘Phoenix’, and more! Get more info at mangamachinations.com and send emails to mangamachinations@gmail.com

Hey guys and welcome to You Just Got Isekai'd, the show for Otaku by Otaku. My name's Tim, and this is the space where me and my buddies chat all things anime. 
For business:
timgabbitas2@gmail.com
A podcast about Gundam, Super Robots and everything in between! Hosted by TheMacabreChap and SentaiFive! #AllMechaAllTheTime
Jim and Frank talk anime and manga from a layperson’s perspective. Listen and learn along with us!
An animated discussion, comparing and contrasting two animated features. They're often Disney (but not always), often musicals (but not always), and often good (but not always).
A Podcast about the one and only Scooby Doo!
Like anime? Me too, come chill. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/animeandchill/support
Join Christian Espinal and Josh Cole as they explore today's manga and American comics.

We are four guys who love to watch Anime and read Manga. This podcast is for people who enjoy Anime, Manga, Western Animation, Video Games, Anime Related Movies, and all things that's related to them. We also give Weekly News Update and a rundown of what Anime we have been watching throughout the week give our honest opinions about them they may or may not get you to watch them. We get comedic at times and sometimes serious but you can be sure you will love all of our personalities and the chemistry that we put into this podcast.

podcast_details.podcast_name: OSMcast! Anime, Video Games, Interviews, and More!
podcast_details.description:
Your podcast for all things awesome! We like to talk about things that are awesome like anime, video games, books, you know. The same stuff all the other geeky podcasts talk about. But can they tell you what's awesome? All the time? I think NOT. But we can. 

We also have guests on from various walks of life, from voice actors and actress, to comics creators, and more! All sorts of awesome folks. That's what specialize in: AWESOME. 

Updates Mondays.

Basic yet not so basic Talk about Anime ! Help me and watch me grow within the Anime Community. I will talk about what I watch and what I would love to watch in near future! This is Chibi Character Development at its finest :)  Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ChibiJ/support

My audio log where I monologue about manga! (Talk about a mouthful... A mouthful of manga, that is! Wait, what...?)

This is a beginner-friendly one-man show that ranges anywhere from 20-30 minutes in length. Introduces a new manga series each episode (but avoids any serious spoilers). 

It's just me, but it doesn't have to be! Listener participation is highly encouraged! Send questions, feedback, recommendations, or your own thoughts on the series I'm covering. (Don't worry, I announce it at the end of each episode, so you can get a head start.)

We give you news information and a few topics surrounding the world of animation and bits of other pop culture. New episode are up every Tuesday and Thursday. Also have fun :) 
Follow us on Twitter at @AnimationNati10 for latest updates.

Welcome to Keyframe from the Geek Show Podcast Network.
This show is dedicated to the glorious medium of animation in all of its forms, from anime and cartoons to stop-motion and more, with plenty of news and reviews.
